repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: A palm leaf manuscript containing the fifth and sixth aṣṭakas (i.e. RV 6.62-9.43) of the Ṛgveda Saṃhitā (saṃhitāpāṭha text), with Vedic accent marked.

msItem.title: Ṛgveda
msItem.rubric: śubham astu | śrīgaṇādhipataye namaḥ | avighnam astu | nirvighnam astu | śrīsarasvatyai namaḥ | śrī gurubhyo namaḥ | hariḥ oṃ
msItem.incipit:
stuṣe narā divo asya prasantāśvinā hu
ve jaramāṇo arkaiḥ | yā sadya usrā vyuṣi jmo antān yuyūṣataḥ pary urū varāṁsi || tā yajñam ā śucibhiḥ ścakramāṇā rathasya bhānuṁ
rurucū rajobhiḥ | purū varāṃsy amitā mimānāpo dhanvāny ati yātho ajrān || tā ha tyad vartir yad ara
msItem.explicit: ścāta | pari prāsiṣyadat kaviḥ | atya hiyānā na hetṛbhiḥ | somaḥ punāno arṣati | somaḥ punāna ete dhāvaṃti pra somāsaḥ svādhyāḥ pra ye gāvas trayaḥ |
msItem.finalRubric:
hariḥ oṃ śrī kṛṣṇā
rpaṇam astu || iti ṣaṣṭhāṣṭake aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ | ṣaṣṭhāṣṭakaṃ saṃpūrṇam | śrīrāmāya namo namaḥ | śrīlaṃkaṃ īśvarāya namaḥ | śrī | śrī | śrī | śrī śrī || ❈ ||—|| śrīkṛṣṇārpaṇam astu | śrīrāmāya namaḥ |
śeṣanirnaya ṣaṣtī ca dvādaśī caiva ardharātryūnanāhnikā | pradoṣam api kurvīta tṛtīyā navamāhnikā |

extent.measure: 3 guard folios inserted at the beginning of the bundle, 192 numbered folios.

supportDesc.foliation: Nandināgarī numerals, on the left margin of the recto, 1 to 192.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation, in spite of some bore holes produced by insects and a few pages damaged at the borders. ff. 1r-78v are inked, f. 79 is uninked; ff. 84r-121r are uninked, f. 121v is inked, ff. 122r-192v are uninked.

binding.p: wooden cover, the back cover is slighlty shorter than the leaves.

listBibl.bibl: Janert, Klaus Ludwig, Poti, N. Narasimhan. 1985. Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. Band II, 7. Stuttgart: F. Steiner. p. 852.

encodingDesc.p: ❈ denotes a puṣpikā. Spaces between words added where possible.
